Gîte for 7 people – Equipped with every comfort

On the first floor, where tobacco leaves used to be dried, there are a landing and two bedrooms of 25 m2 each. One bedroom has four single 90 x 190 cm beds. In the other bedroom is a double bed (140 x 200 cm). On the landing is a cot.
If you want to spend a week end, a week in our beautiful Region, we will be happy to welcome you in our gîte 6 persons.

To visit to La Ferme Rose Cottage ...
This charming romantic holiday-cottage is suitable for 2-4 people and can be rented from 490 euro per week.
The gîte is available on a self-catering basis for a minimum of four nights.
The Gite is open throughout the year, with a minimum stay of 3 nights.
